msg_welcome_intro:
ğŸ¾ *Welcome to CatWatch!*

This bot helps you track and care for homeless cats. You can log feedings, medical visits, and plan future care.
msg_auth_needed: To use all features, you need to authorize:
msg_auth_success: After signing in, you will be able to add and edit data.
msg_auth_unavailable: Authorization is currently unavailable. Please contact administrator.
msg_main_menu: Main menu is available below. Some features require authorization.
msg_help_body:
This bot is designed for volunteers to track homeless cats and their care procedures.

*Main Features:*
â€¢ ğŸ± *Cats*: View the list of all registered cats. Click on a cat to see its details, history, and photos.
â€¢ âœï¸ *Add cat*: Register a new cat in the system.
â€¢ ğŸ“… *Upcoming*: See a global schedule of planned events for all cats for the next 7 days.

*Inside a Cat Card:*
â€¢ ğŸ‘ *Seen*: Share the current location of the cat or just mark as seen.
â€¢ ğŸ¥£ *Feed* / ğŸ” *Observe*: Quick log of a feeding or detailed observation (condition, photo, location).
â€¢ ğŸ“ *Edit*: Change cat's info (name, condition, tags, etc.) or delete cat profile.
â€¢ ğŸ–¼ *Photos*: View all photos and upload new ones (up to 5 at once).
â€¢ ğŸ“… *Schedule*: View planned events for this cat or plan a new one.

*Tips:*
â€¢ Use the *âŒ Cancel* button to stop any multi-step process.
â€¢ You can send up to 5 photos as an album when adding photos.
â€¢ When planning an event, you can set it as recurring (e.g., daily feeding).

Need more help? Contact your local coordinator.
